meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Putin to Visit North Korea Russian President Vladimir V. Putin's proposed trip to Pyongyang next month seems calculated to counter the Clinton administration's missile defense plan.
Putin to Visit North Korea Russian President Vladimir V. Putin's proposed trip to Pyongyang next month seems calculated to counter the Clinton administration's missile defense plan.
Chief at Procter Quits The chief executive of Procter & Gamble, the maker of Crest, Pringles and Tide, resigned as the company said it would suffer another disappointing quarter.
Same-Sex Benefits at Big 3 G.M., Ford and the Chrysler unit of DaimlerChrysler said they would offer benefits for same-sex partners of U.S. employees.
Dallas Stays Alive, 1-0 Mike Modano scored early in the third overtime to keep New Jersey still one game away from the Stanley Cup.
